data.text: @iceeterry Flight times shown in the Itinerary Receipt are not guaranteed and may change between the date of reservation and the date of travel as circumstances may warrant. Thank you!

@iceeterry We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We want all our guests to have a smooth worry free travel but there are reasons that are beyond our control which forced us to cancel or defer schedules of some flights.

data.text:
@iceeterry Unless otherwise required by the airport authorities and as indicated in the Itinerary Receipt, the boarding gate will close fifteen (15) minutes before departure.
Announcements were made as well as the final call for the missing passengers. Thank you!

@iceeterry Hi Lester! Boarding procedure and the period allowed for boarding shall be determined by the Airline which may be changed from time to time. However, the Passenger must be at the boarding gate at least thirty (30) minutes prior to the scheduled departure time of his flight.
@iceeterry Hi Lester! This is Tel. May I know your concern? Thank you!

@michaela2985 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Michaela. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text:
Fly Easy this holiday season - get set to travel a week before your flight! Just check in online and download your boarding pass. 

Don’t worry, you can still make changes and manage your booking even after you’ve checked in.

Go online and check in at: https://t.co/IlIvnSvRyV https://t.co/zVfwZnDFY3
@K_Broooo You can go to this link https://t.co/rfiF2XbgDi for more information, Sai. Thank you!
@K_Broooo Hi Sai! Tel here. Every passenger is allowed one (1) carry-on baggage inside the cabin, with a maximum weight of seven (7) kilograms and dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm. Thank you!

data.text: @linusbreyess I'm sorry to hear this Linus. Please do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.
@andreaasudario Got this andrea.  I'll reach out to a case owner and will respond to you soon. For the meantime, please monitor your email. Thank you for your patience.
